name: space war (itch) (wp23456)
description:
It is a two player game where a Warrior and a Mage battle, to defeat the most aliens and meteorites. There are three stages and one boss with 100 hit points.

The Warrior starts with 12 lives and faster fire speed but slower movement speed.

The Mage starts with 3 lives and faster movement speed but slower fire speed and also regenerates 1 life every 5 seconds.

the controls are:

Warrior:

bullet = x,

nuke = z,

up = w,

down = s,

left =a,

right =d,

Mage:

bullet = p,

nuke = o,

up = up key,

down = down key,

left =left key,

right =right key,

also there are 2 power ups:

a life: +1 life,

a nuke +1 nuke,
